q1: Are they the strongest team in Africa?
q2: Nigeria is currently the best team in Africa.
a2: That will probably be this way for few more years.
a3: Nigeria have won the Africa Cup of Nations three times (in 1980, 1994, and 2013), but have never advanced past the Round of 16 in the World Cup.
q4: It is a strong team but always lacks something else
a4: They must train hard until they get enough improvement
q5: What do you think about Nigeria's front line?
a5: Nigerias front line is not strong at all compared to great players today.
